a.n: NKOTBSB - Live From The O2 Arena London

p.d: When two mega pop supergroups join together for a worldwide tour only one thing can happen! Hit after hit, dance routines, electrify audience and not to forget the amazing fans! NKOTB aka New Kids On The Block and BSB aka The Backstreet Boys send the audience of the 02 Arena, London into meltdown for this NKOTBSB show. A must for every fan, every upcoming pop star, or just sheer enjoyment.
